channel.title: Where/How Do I start learning java & C++ coding?
channel.description:
My, Father has alot of time to his self and saw me coding I am a beginner so my father wants to learn aswell
To Wrap It Up! Please post replys on guides and tutorials on how to start it all! Thank you!

item.title: Where/How Do I start learning java & C++ coding?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

For Java tutorials: http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/
For C++ tutorials: http://www.cplusplus.com/doc/tutorial/

Read full topic
item.source: Where/How Do I start learning java & C++ coding?
